casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATL. ASSN.
v.
CONRAD 2018-0834 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 4, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's "third party interest motion for recusal or disqualification of a justice(s) pending motion for leave in trial court to file motion for clarification of summary judgment instanter." Motion denied.
